navigationRoot.fieldDescription: The root page from which to build the navigation. Can be a blueprint master, language master or regular page.

collectAllPages.fieldDescription: Collect all pages that are descendants of the navigation root.

structureDepth.fieldDescription: Depth of the navigation structure relative to the navigation root.
